colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,(^PHAN CHEN THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA CHEN PO RJE BTZUN BLO BZANG YE SHES DPAL @007B BZANG POS MDZAD PA'I GSHIN PO RJES 'DZIN GYI CHO GA THAR PA'I LAM SGRON LAS GSUNGS PA LTAR GYI RIGS LNGA'I BUM CHU BSGRUB TSUL 'DI NI, RANG GI RJED DANG BYAD DANG SLOB BU RNAMS KYI LAG LEN DU MKHO BAR BSAMS TE, ^CHOS RJE'I THA SHAL SKAL BZANG MING CAN BDAG GIS BSGRIGS PA LA, YE SHES SPYAN LDAN RNAMS KYIS BZOD PAR MDZAD DU GSOL, ,YI GE PA NI SHE DAR PI LIG THU BLO BZANG RIG GROL LO, ,)
